string-array.item: Q：how do I pass the first level？
A：Push all boxes to locations of the flags, the you will pass.

A：Try to let the man walks to the pixel next to the box, so that he can control/push the box by walking towards that direction. If there is an obstacle in the direction of movement, then the Prince could not make that move.
A：touch the direction you want the Prince move towards.
A：Retart the current level if you press "restart" button. Exist the entire game if you press "exist" button.
